name: Exposing Fiat Currency Fraud
description: Revealing how fiat money systems are engineered to create artificial scarcity, economic enslavement, and wealth consolidation.
focus: Inflation as a Wealth Transfer Mechanism

cards.title: The Fiat Currency Con Game
cards.description: Understanding the illusion of value in fiat money.
bulletpoints: Fiat money has no intrinsic value—its worth is dictated by central authorities.
Governments and banks manipulate fiat supply to control economies.
Currency devaluation is an intentional method of wealth extraction.
cards.summaryText: Expose fiat’s illusion, track centralized manipulation, and see devaluation as engineered extraction.

cards.title: Debt as a Weapon
cards.description: How debt-based financial systems create perpetual servitude.
bulletpoints: Banking institutions thrive on interest-based slavery.
National debts are engineered to justify economic austerity and social control.
Student loans, mortgages, and credit traps keep individuals in a controlled cycle.
cards.summaryText: Recognize debt as planned servitude—interest slavery, national austerity, and personal credit traps.

cards.title: Inflation and the Great Wealth Transfer
cards.description: How inflation is used as an invisible tax to rob the public.
bulletpoints: Inflation is engineered to reduce the purchasing power of the masses.
Elites use asset accumulation strategies to protect wealth while others suffer.
Understanding hyperinflation events exposes how economic control systems operate.
cards.summaryText: Treat inflation as stealth tax, note elite asset shelters, and study hyperinflation as the control manual.
